item.title: Akisato Kimura, Naonori Ueda, Naoki Yasuda, Nao Suzuki, Masaomi Tanaka, Akira Moriya, Nozomu Tominaga, Tomoki Morokuma, Naoki Yoshita Ichiro Takahashi
Go Irie, Akisato Kimura, Hirokazu Kameoka, Kaoru Hiramatsu, Kunio Kashino Mirela Ostrek
Katsuhiko Ishiguro, Akisato Kimura, Takeshi Yamada, Naonori Ueda Masahiro Nakano

item.description: Akisato Kimura is the group leader of Recognition Research Group at Media Information Laboratory, NTT Communication Science Laboratories. His research interests include media understanding, pattern recognition, machine learning, data mining and computer vision.
